name: The Violet Girls
description:
“Did she still like ice cream? . . . The silence stretched between us, heavy and suffocating.”

Story

The Violet Girls is a short kinetic novel about two young women desperately trying to rekindle a childhood friendship both know they have outgrown.

Credits

Engine: Ren’Py version 7.3.5.606

Creator & Writer: hiraethtea

Programmer: NateKauko

GUI: cire [CC BY-NC 3.0] [modification: pre-made title screen replaced with original title screen.]

Sprites: Shida [CC-BY-NC-SA 3.0]

Music: Prod. Riddiman, Prod. Zeeky Beats

Backgrounds: Chocolate Berry, NEEPROJECT, sei.chan [CC BY-NC 3.0]

Sound Effects: Charel Sytze [CC BY 3.0] 

Title Screen Assets: Public Domain Vectors
